subject: docs: add user actions documentation preference
body:
Add principle #11 to document manual user actions in docs/USER_ACTIONS.md
when external dashboard or credential configuration is required.

Create docs/USER_ACTIONS.md template for tracking pending and completed
manual actions with detailed instructions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: add user actions documentation preference
